arn.description: The ARN of the config rule

evaluationModes.description: The modes the Config rule can be evaluated in. See Evaluation Mode for more details.

inputParameters.description: A string in JSON format that is passed to the AWS Config rule Lambda function.

maximumExecutionFrequency.description: The maximum frequency with which AWS Config runs evaluations for a rule.

ruleId.description: The ID of the config rule

scope.description: Scope defines which resources can trigger an evaluation for the rule. See Source Below.

source.description: Source specifies the rule owner, the rule identifier, and the notifications that cause the function to evaluate your AWS resources. See Scope Below.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
